songs.title: Hot Topic (Snippet)
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics from Snippet]

[Intro]
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Migo!
Ooooh

[Hook: Quavo]
Hot topic (yeah) told her pop it
Money in my pocket (cash)
We hot boxin' (hot box)
On the tropics, yeah we on a island (Yeah)
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Hot topic yeah we poppin'
Hot topic yeah we poppin'
Bad bitch Mona Lisa
1000 miles just to meet ya
Now I want one to keep her
It's cheaper to leave her
